title: Austin Energy
cleaned_text: You can register to report outages and get text alerts on your mobile phone. Get the latest info about large-scale outage and emergency situations. We offer year-round rebates and incentives to help you make energy-efficiency improvements. [ Sep 07, 2023, 4:03:00 AM CDT ](/about/environment/renewable-power-generation) Renewable energy relies upon available wind and sunshine. The output varies day to day and hour to hour.
